name: iButtonTag
description: Handle iButton identification tags such as DS1990A, TM1990A, RW1990 and many others. Supports multiple iButton probes on the same data line and provides utility functions.
keywords: iButton, tag, identification, id, probe, onewire, 1-wire, bus, DS1990, DS1990A, DS1990R, TM1990A, RW1990
